content.label: Check Updates
content.description: Check if newer versions of the system are available

content.label: Delete User Data
content.description: Delete all your settings and data

askForConfirm.title: Confirm Delete user Data
askForConfirm.message: This will delete all your personal settings, favourites and playlists (USB and NAS music won't be deleted). The system will automatically restart once data has been deleted. Do you want to continue?

content.label: Factory Reset
content.description: Reset your System to factory Settings

askForConfirm.title: Confirm Factory Reset
askForConfirm.message: This will reset your device to factory settings, all your settings will be lost. The system will automatically restart once reset. Do you want to continue?
